changelog.title: Dark Arts Gate Access
changelog.description: Clicking Dark Arts in Flux Capacitor now takes you to Gate 1 to begin the Five Gates CTF challenge.

changelog.title: Flux Capacitor Navigation System
changelog.description: Radioactive green teleportation button for instant travel between all 8 houses. Press ~ or click to activate.

changelog.title: House Interconnection
changelog.description: Navigate between Web, Shield, Cloud, Forge, Script, Code, Key, and Eye houses without returning to Dashboard.

changelog.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
changelog.description: Press 1-8 for quick house selection, ~ to toggle, Esc to close. Power user friendly.
